column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////- 2 servings of paella valenciana (basically paella with a shitload of pork): don't eat this if you're dieting
column3: or are scared of grease. It was delicious and flavors were extremely rich and fatty
column4: but it was literally swimming in grease and there was complete meat overload. Best paella I've had taste-wise
column5: but left me feeling extremely thirsty and a bit guilty afterwards.
